oai_dc:dc.dc:description: If a pubertal girl sees the men bringing game home they become fixed to the ground. 1) This story is found in Book II-37.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The effect of a new maiden's gaze
